title: CoQ10
cleaned_text: Description A dietary supplement to support cardiovascular and periodontal functions.* CoQ10 is an essential catalyst for the creation of energy at the cellular level. Coenzyme Q10 is an important antioxidant and is recommended to support proper heart, liver, and gum tissue functions.* Product is available in capsules or pleasant tasting chewable tablets and a quick dissolving chew melt tablet. More Information Ingredients: Suggested Use: As a dietary supplement, take 1 chewmelt tablet daily with a meal, or as directed by your healthcare practitioner. Supplement Facts Serving Size 1 Tablet Servings Per Container 60 Amount per Serving % Daily Value Calories 5 Total Carbohydrates 1 g <1% Vitamin E mg 23% Coenzyme Q10 (Ubiquinone) 100 mg * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000-calorie diet *Daily Value not established. Other ingredients: mannitol, silicon dioxide, stearic acid, citric acid, natural orange flavor, and natural pineapple flavor. Color of this product may vary due to color variations of the natural ingredients. WARNING: If pregnant or nursing, consult your healthcare practitioner before taking this product. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place. *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. Disclaimer, Policies, Shipping Shipping Policy Most products ship within 2-3 business days of order receipt. Certain items ship within 7-10 business days. We reserve the right to consolidate shipments when the cart contains products from each fulfillment period. Return Policy We strive to provide products that will help you live a healthy life and our intent is to make you happy. Specialty Items are final sale and may not be returned. - 30 day money back on unopened products. Disclaimer The content of this website is based upon the opinion of Dr. Ellie Wright. The information on this website is not intended as medical advise nor to replace a one-on-one relationship with a qualified health care professional. Dr. Wright encourages you to make your own health care decisions based upon our research and to seek a qualified health care professional to help you. If you have a medical condition, if you are taking medications or if you are pregnant or nursing consult your health care professional before using products from this website. This website is intended to share information and knowledge obtained by Dr. Ellie Wright. FDA COMPLIANCE The information on this website has not been evaluated by the Food & Drug Administration or any other medical body. We do not aim to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness or disease. Information is shared for educational purposes only. You must consult your doctor before acting on any content on this website, especially if you are pregnant, nursing, taking medication or have a medical condition.
